A more detailed description ...

Coupling loops

These loops are used to feed and/or remove energy from the cavity. They primarily couple to the oscillating magnetic field within the cavity. Pointers to more information are given in the experiment description.

The SMA connector is a commercial part (Emerson 142-0701-491, available from Digi-Key as P/N J998-ND). The wire loops are made of #24 AWG copper wire, with enamel insulation. The copper housing was constructed by the UW Science Shops.
